14 class SDLController : public ManualController {
15 public:
16  SDLController() = default;
17  virtual ~SDLController() = default;
18 
19  SDLController(const SDLController&) = delete;
20  SDLController& operator=(const SDLController&) = delete;
21  SDLController(SDLController&&) = delete;
22  SDLController& operator=(const SDLController&&) = delete;
23 
24  virtual void process_sdl(SDL_Event* event) = 0;
25  [[nodiscard]] virtual SDL_JoystickID get_id() const = 0;
26 };

28 class KeyboardController : public SDLController {
29 public:
30  KeyboardController();
31  ~KeyboardController() override;
32 
33  KeyboardController(const KeyboardController&) = delete;
34  KeyboardController& operator=(const KeyboardController&) = delete;
35  KeyboardController(KeyboardController&&) = delete;
36  KeyboardController& operator=(const KeyboardController&&) = delete;
37 
38  [[nodiscard]] ControllerCommand get_command() const override;
39 
40  [[nodiscard]] std::string get_description() const override { return "Keyboard controller"; }
41 
42  [[nodiscard]] std::string get_uuid() const override { return "keyboard-controller"; }
43 
44  void process_sdl(SDL_Event* event) override;
45 
46  [[nodiscard]] SDL_JoystickID get_id() const override { return -1; }
47 
48 private:
49  SDL_Window* window_ = nullptr;
50  SDL_Renderer* renderer_ = nullptr;
51 
52  double kick_power_ = 0.5;
53  double dribble_power_ = 0.0;

56 class GamepadController : public SDLController {
57 public:
58  GamepadController(SDL_GameController* controller) : my_controller_{controller} {}
59  ~GamepadController() override = default;
60 
61  GamepadController(const GamepadController&) = delete;
62  GamepadController& operator=(const GamepadController&) = delete;
63  GamepadController(GamepadController&&) = delete;
64  GamepadController& operator=(const GamepadController&&) = delete;
65 
66  [[nodiscard]] ControllerCommand get_command() const override;
67 
68  [[nodiscard]] std::string get_description() const override {
69  return fmt::format("Gamepad controller {}", get_id());
70  }
71 
72  [[nodiscard]] std::string get_uuid() const override {
73  return fmt::format("gamepad-controller-{}", get_id());
74  }
75 
76  void process_sdl(SDL_Event* event) override;
77 
78  [[nodiscard]] SDL_JoystickID get_id() const override {
79  return SDL_JoystickInstanceID(SDL_GameControllerGetJoystick(my_controller_));
80  }
81 
82 private:
83  [[nodiscard]] bool get_button(SDL_GameControllerButton button) const {
84  return static_cast<bool>(SDL_GameControllerGetButton(my_controller_, button));
85  }
86 
87  [[nodiscard]] float get_axis(SDL_GameControllerAxis axis) const {
88  static constexpr float kAxisMax = 32768.0f;
89  return static_cast<float>(SDL_GameControllerGetAxis(my_controller_, axis)) / kAxisMax;
90  }
91 
92  SDL_GameController* my_controller_;
93 
94  double kick_power_ = 0.5;
95  double dribble_power_ = 0.0;
96 };

108  SDLControllerProvider& operator=(const SDLControllerProvider&) = delete;
109  SDLControllerProvider(SDLControllerProvider&&) = delete;
110  SDLControllerProvider& operator=(const SDLControllerProvider&&) = delete;
111 
112  void update() override;
113 
114 private:
115  std::vector<std::unique_ptr<SDLController>> controllers_;
116  std::function<void(ManualController*)> on_connect_;
117  std::function<void(ManualController*)> on_disconnect_;
118 };
